answers.answer: Dear Jeanne:  Many women have taken tamoxifen for longer than the now-recommended 5 years.  There is no documented evidence of neuropathy from tamoxifen. There is documentation of an increased risk of endometrial cancer with long term tamoxifen use. As mentioned in your previous post, neuropathy is well-documented in diabetes.

question: Have there been any studies on taking Tomaxifin longer than the 5 year period?  I took it for 12 (under my Dr.'s advice) and have neurapathy in my feet. Thank you.
title: Tomaxifin Side Effects
